updates.details: To address recent intermittent breaks in connection, specific interventions are planned on the RAL site firewall (affecting traffic into/out of JASMIN) on Wednesday 11th June, between 07:00-09:00. These will put in place a workaround to prolong periods of stability while the root cause (now understood) can be addressed. Further planned outages and the continued risk of unplanned outages will remain for some days/weeks to come. Apologies for any inconvenience meanwhile.
STFC engineers report that the reoccuring network issues in recent weeks are now resolved. Any further networking issues should be reported as new.
We are aware of a loss of network connectivity at the RAL site. The site networking team are aware and working on a fix. This is affecting external access to ALL JASMIN and CEDA services.
Network connectivity has been restored, and CEDA and JASMIN services are accessible. However, the root cause remains unknown so all services remain at risk.
Advance notice of regular scheduled maintenance day on Tues 29 July 2025. Please plan your work to minimise disruption.
